MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L31 and L39 postcode areas of Liverpool and Ormskirk affecting properties in Melling, Aughton and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further network investigations required to locate and repair the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:34PM on 27th April 2021.
